name: James' Door: He is not home right now. Please leave
name_original: James' Door: He is not home right now. Please leave
description:
i made a videogame where you ring my doorbell and it tells you "sorry james is not home right now, please leave" but its useless because i dont live in the videogame so it doesn't work right. - me on twitter.

⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️

You can knock on the door and ring the doorbell but that is it. You would be paying $3.00 for a 5 second experience. If you do buy it, you can duplicate it, so theoretically you paid $3.00 for 100 (or more!) copies of this doorbell game and that's kind of neat.

Ps: The doorbell is very precise when you try to click it so it's easy to miss.
